an10.77:1.3: Dhamsi ca, pagabbho ca, tintino ca, mahagghaso ca, luddo ca, akaruniko ca, dubbalo ca, oravita ca, mutthassati ca, necayiko ca—
an10.77:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannagato kako.
an10.77:1.5: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannagato papabhikkhu.
an10.77:1.7: Dhamsi ca, pagabbho ca, tintino ca, mahagghaso ca, luddo ca, akaruniko ca, dubbalo ca, oravita ca, mutthassati ca, necayiko ca—
an10.77:1.8: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi asaddhammehi samannagato papabhikkhu”ti.
